glance.title: Key Points at a Glance

chapter1.title: 1. Nature and Scope of Our Services

venue.title: 1.1. The Platform as a Venue
venue.p1: Nomadik is a technology platform that acts as a marketplace to connect Clients and Coaches. We are not a coaching agency, nor are we a provider of coaching services. Our role is limited to providing the technological infrastructure. We are not a party to the direct agreement or the coaching relationship between a Client and a Coach.

deemedSupplier.title: 1.2. Our Role in Transactions
deemedSupplier.p1: For the purposes of billing, invoicing, and tax collection, the Platform is considered a 'Deemed Supplier'. This means the Client's contract of sale for coaching services is with Nomadik GmbH. The Coach, in turn, provides their service to Nomadik GmbH as an independent contractor. This structure is to simplify billing and ensure tax compliance.

noGuarantee.title: 1.3. No Endorsement and No Guarantees
noGuarantee.p1: The Platform may verify certain qualifications of Coaches, but we make no guarantee, representation, or endorsement regarding the ability, qualifications, quality, safety, or legality of the services provided by Coaches. A Client's decision to engage a Coach is at their own risk. We are not responsible for the conduct, omissions, or content of any User on the Platform.

modifications.title: 1.4. Service Modifications
modifications.p1: We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any aspect of our Services at any time, without prior notice. Material changes to these TOS will be communicated to Users with at least 30 days' notice.

coachDisclaimer.p1: You acknowledge and agree that you engage Coaches at your own sole risk. payment.p1: You agree to pay all applicable fees for Services you purchase through the Platform. You acknowledge that the final, binding price is authoritatively calculated by our servers at the moment of payment initiation. You expressly agree to the Platform's billing models, including pre-payment for scheduled sessions and programs, and post-session charges based on actual duration for Live Sessions and any authorized Overtime.

refunds.p1: Cancellations are subject to the cancellation policy selected by the Coach and displayed during the booking process. All refund requests are handled according to this process. In the event of a dispute, you agree that the Platform's decision is final and binding, as detailed in Chapter 5. conduct.p1: Your interactions with all other Users must comply with our Community Guidelines at all times. Any misuse of the Platform or disrespectful behavior towards Coaches or other Clients may result in immediate account termination.

chapter5.preamble: This chapter defines the process for resolving disputes between Users and establishes the Platform's final decision-making authority.

userToUser.p1: In the event of a disagreement between a Client and a Coach, both parties are encouraged to first communicate directly and in good faith to find an amicable resolution. The Platform provides communication tools for this purpose.
